extendedInfo.description: On-the-Go Bible is a great new way to use Logos Bible Software's online tools.  Use on your phone or tablet with one simple app and multiple views.This is a bible study app more than a bible reading app.  Get online passage guides for your chapter quickly without tapping anything. Switch quickly and easily between reading the Bible, jotting down notes, and studying the passage.Now includes Community Notes. Instead of only writing your own journals, upload your thoughts on chapters to our community and enjoy the ability to study the Bible together. See the far top right 'windows' icon on the journal pane.On-the-Go Bible Study uses Logos Bible Software and biblia.com as well as bibles.org and is designed to help you study the Bible in multiple ways. However, you don't need a Logos or biblia.com account to use the software. If you do get an account you get access to more commentaries and other resources. Search Passage Guides Journal Bible Studies Bookmarks You can also set up a library of your thoughts. Easily save and retrieve journals of past passages.  *requires Wifi for biblical text other than KJV/ESV and to install XML bibles - caches content you read for offline retrieval later, More features on the paid version.

reviews.title: Completely useless
reviews.comment: This app is a mess (I am being kind).  I put it on to use my Logos and it froze up immediately. Starting and stopping the application did nothing.  Total waste of time....sorry guys...back to the drawing board.
reviews.author: Joshua Lieder

reviews.title: False advertisement doesn\'t do what it claims and waste of time
reviews.comment: This app has no features it claims to have I have never rated an app till now but I\'m compelled to give this the lowest rating in hopes the developer improves this. Great idea no substance therefore no value
reviews.author: David Klements
